title: WTB: Low grade Drum, Uzit, Carolina Brights, or Broad Leaf backs
author: evergreen1988

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade Drum, Uzit, Carolina Brights, or Broad Leaf backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade, more affordable examples. Any front is fine. Authentic, with qualifiers, paper loss, etc. would all be ok at the right price. Looking for PSA (preferred) or SGC graded only. 

Please email [URL="evergreen1988@outlook.com"]evergreen1988@outlook.com[/URL] if you have any for sale.

Mike
